se.jguru.nazgul.core.persistence.model.converter

Class DateTimeTimestampConverter

  • java.lang.Object
    • se.jguru.nazgul.core.persistence.model.converter.DateTimeTimestampConverter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javax.persistence.AttributeConverter<org.joda.time.DateTime,Timestamp>

    public class DateTimeTimestampConverter
extends Object
implements javax.persistence.AttributeConverter<org.joda.time.DateTime,Timestamp>
    JPA AttributeConverter class to handle joda-time DateTimes - and convert them to and from Timestamps. Uses a pre-defined Chronology for the conversion, which can be re-assigned by a call to setChronology(Chronology).
    Author:
    Lennart Jörelid, jGuru Europe AB
